Package com.bluegosling.concurrent.locks

New types of locks and synchronizers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HierarchicalLock.AcquiredLock
    The result of acquiring a HierarchicalLock.
    Locking
    An interface that encapsulates typical locking patterns.
    Locking.ReadWriteLocking
    An interface that encapsulates typical patterns for read-write locks.
    Locking.StampedLocking
    An interface that encapsulates typical patterns for stamped locks.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoubleInstanceLock<T>
    A concurrency mechanism allowing concurrent readers and an exclusive writer.
    HierarchicalLock
    A hierarchical lock that supports shared and exclusive locking modes and supports lock promotion and demotion.
    NonReentrantLock
    A non-reentrant lock.
    SpinLock
    A non-reentrant and unfair lock that "spins" while waiting to lock.

Package com.bluegosling.concurrent.locks Description

New types of locks and synchronizers. These include some new implementations of the standard Lock interface as well as some alternative APIs.

One new lock, HierarchicalLock, can be used to implement MVCC locking with a hierarchy of objects, like might be used in a database system. It is similar to a ReadWriteLock except that is also provides a lock hierarchy. Acquiring a lock (in any mode) requires acquiring the lock's parent in shared (e.g. "read") mode. This lock also has deadlock-detection and provides the ability to promote locks (e.g. shared → exclusive or child lock → parent lock) and to demote them (exclusive → shared or parent → child).
